entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 09:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: 17 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
